Select 
	Distinct
	Left(RIGHT(TABLE_NAME, 8),11) as TABLE_NAME
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
where TABLE_NAME like '%Location'

Select 
       [Code],
       [Name],
       replace([Address], ',', ' ') as [Address],
       replace([Address 2], ',', '') as [Address 2],
       [City],
       [Phone No_],
       [Phone No_ 2],
       [Post Code],
       [County],
       [E-Mail],
       [Country_Region Code],
       [Use As In-Transit],
       [Require Put-away],
       [Require Pick],
       [Use Cross-Docking],
       [Require Receive],
       [Require Shipment], 
       [State Code],
       [Subcontracting Location],
       [Subcontractor No_],
       [Depot],
       '10001' as Site_Code
